context_of_use: This use case allows customers to search, browse by category, and view product details to find items.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find items easily
description: Allow customers to search, browse by category, and view product details to find items.
triggering_event: Customer initiates a product search or browsing action.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer can view a list of products based on search or category.
assumptions: The customer has access to the internet.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System displays detailed information about the selected product.
